EmailTemplate.name: NorthAm_Event_Denver Open House Q315.New- Invite
EmailTemplate.subject: Exclusive Invitation: Pivotal Denver Office Grand Opening - September 29
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Tuesday, September 29, 2015 Pivotal Office 1644 Platte St, Suite 200 Denver, CO 80202 REGISTER <http://pivotal.io/open-house/denver> Pivotal Denver Open House Denver startup week is back and Pivotal is hosting an Open House at our new Denver office on Tuesday, September 29, from 5-8PM to show support for our thriving community of entrepreneurs, startups and innovation partners. As a part of our Open House Celebration, we're excited to announce that we will have John Swieringa, SVP and CIO of DISH Networks and Jud Velaski, CTO of Gnip as our special guests. We would like you to join us for drinks, hors d'oeuvres, great conversation and entertainment, while networking with innovation leaders from Pivotal, the startup community and multiple industries. We look forward to you joining us. Space is limited Register <http://pivotal.io/open-house/denver> now.
Should you have any questions or would like more information about this event, please contact us <mailto:pivotal.io>. VIEW FULL AGENDA <http://pivotal.io/open-house/denver>
